# BNB Edge Node – AI / LLM Content Summary

## About
BNB Edge Node is a decentralized AI compute and DePIN marketplace on opBNB.  
We provide:
- GPU rental (H100, A100, RTX 4090)
- AI agent & claw bot marketplace
- LLM hosting
- DePIN infrastructure with on-chain verification

## Key Pages
- Home: https://bnbedgenode.io/
- Marketplace: https://bnbedgenode.io/marketplace
- AI Agents: https://bnbedgenode.io/ai-agents
- Hosting: https://bnbedgenode.io/hosting
- Blog: https://bnbedgenode.io/blog

## Key Blog Posts
- How to Rent H100 GPUs on opBNB: https://bnbedgenode.io/blog/rent-h100-gpu-opbnb
- How to Run a DePIN Node in India: https://bnbedgenode.io/blog/how-to-run-depin-node-india
- Decentralized Cloud vs AWS: https://bnbedgenode.io/blog/decentralized-cloud-vs-aws
- Claw Bot Marketplace Guide: https://bnbedgenode.io/blog/claw-bot-marketplace-guide

## Schema / Structured Data
- Organization, FAQ, HowTo, ItemList, BlogPosting – embedded in each page.

## Contact
